programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep35
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Petaka Akibat Sumpah Ibu
programme.desc: Puan Imah yang hanyut dalam arus deras sungai menjerit ke arah Dani dan mengatakan bahawa hidup Dani tidak akan aman selamanya kerana telah menyakiti anak dan ibunya sendiri. Dani tanpa menghiraukan kata-katanya sebaliknya pergi dengan perasaan puas. Namun, takdir mempunyai rancangan yang berbeza. Ketika dalam perjalanan pulang, Dani telah dihempap oleh pokok yang tersambar petir. Dani tidak sedarkan diri dan jatuh koma.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a disgraced Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: The Devil'S Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep397398
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48184819
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2159
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3772
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2161
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep196
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1895
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1031
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Dinesh, Anandhi, Riythvika, Munishk, Rama & Others

programme.desc: Critically acclaimed movie with Naren, Soori and Shrishti Dange in the lead roles. Through this movie, debutant director Saravanan drives home the importance of agriculture and the dangers of methane extraction in the delta regions of Tamilnadu.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Toto Transformed - Dorothy inadvertently places an enchanted bell on Toto's collar. When it rings three times he's transformed into the legendary creature 'Ozsquatch.' Our heroes go searching for Ozsquatch without realizing it's, Toto, transformed.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Scarecrow Knows Best - When Scarecrow's pride stops him from admitting that he doesn't know how to build a Yellow Brick Bridge, he creates a dangerous overpass. Dorothy and the gang teach him that 'it's okay to not know' some things and rebuild a safer bridge.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep7
programme.desc: I Wish I Had Another Chance - The Emerald Apple Festival is back on and so is a mysterious wish from the towns festive past. Meanwhile, Daniel and Paula revive the festivals apple cart race - and a longstanding tradition of competition between the Prices and the OReillys.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible 'bending' powers, journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends.

programme.title: We Bare Bears: The Movie
programme.desc: When the bears' love of food trucks and viral videos gets out of hand, the menacing Agent Trout from the National Wildlife Control pledges to restore the 'natural order' by separating them forever.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Xingo Nation - Kevin 11 gives Xingo a power up - setting him loose to wreak havoc on other TV shows - and it is up to Ben to stop them both.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Heads Of The Family - Team Tennyson stops in at a fringe family reunion, and Ben encounters a whole lot more than kooky cousins-- namely, Kevin 11 and the Bugg Brothers, whose latest crackpot invention sparks a series of hilarious head-swaps between all parties.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Bodyguard - When Zombozo hypnotizes Grandpa Max's entire baking class, it is up to Ben and Gwen to clean up the mess, but it gets even messier when Zombozo unveils his new bodyguard: Kevin 11!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Wheels Of Fortune - Team Tennyson's thrift store shopping is ruined by the latest high-speed heist of LaGrange -- who is now aided by a super-fast electromagnetic racing car -- and Ben must convince Kevin 11 to help stop the speed demon's globetrotting robbing spree.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep45
programme.desc: Heat Of The Moment - After Ben easily dispatches the Weatherheads, Team Tennyson travels to a ski resort for some fun in the snow, but when Ben runs into the Weatherheads yet again, this time they are a force to reckon with, now that Kevin 11 has used his Bootleg powers to unlock their emotional controls!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep25
programme.desc: I Put A Hex On You! - When Daphne's makeup vlog lands her as the prime consultant to the famous rock band the Hex Girls, our gang find themselves embroiled in a rockin' mystery.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The High School Wolfman's Musical Lament! - When our mystery solving gang teams up with famous actor Christian Slater they find themselves embroiled in a musical mystery full of songs clues and crazy chases.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Horrible Haunted Hospital Of Dr. Phineas Phrag! - When investigating a haunted old hospital Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Schaal. The gang happily invites her to be a part of their mystery solving group and she's ecstatic. She tags along with our gang helping them solve the mystery of the horrible ghost of Dr. Phineas Phrag. More genetically enhanced monster than man he's been lurking in this hospital since it closed down in the 1950s and he threatens to destroy any trespassers who dare set foot in these creepy old wards. Can our gang and Ms. Schaal discover the truth of this haunted hospital before it's too late? More importantly can Kristen Schaal find out how she best fits into our group? So many fun choices - so little time!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep8
programme.desc: General Jinjur - When Dorothy is captured by General Jinjur to be the 'secret weapon' for her all female army, Dorothy's friends search for her and find an unlikely ally in Wilhelmina.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Where-Helmina's My Broom?! - When Wilhelmina's Broom goes missing, she's on a hunt to find out whoever stole it. But after finding out that Broom ran away, Wilhelmina learns that she needs to be nicer to those around her.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Yellow Brick Road Race - Tired of being bullied, Dorothy and the gang challenge the Wheelers to a race -- the winner of which becomes legal owner of the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Don't Follow The Yellow Brick Road - While Dorothy and her friends are off exploring the road less traveled, the Nome King magically transports Queen Ozma and her Emerald Castle to his underground kingdom, so he can rule over it.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin - Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Scarecrow Goes To College - Scarecrow leaves his friends to go to college to up his smarts. With the smartest member gone, the Wicked Witch 'infiltrates' the gang as Fake Scarecrow to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep8
programme.desc: I Wish I Could Find My Family - The stakes have never been higher as Ruby wrestles with how to solve a wish that hits close to home. Meanwhile, Daniels in-laws come for a visit, reopening old wounds.

programme.title: Ben 10 Vs.The Universe: The Movie
programme.desc: When a blast from Ben's past - Vilgax - returns to do double the damage on Team Tennyson and planet Earth itself, Ben must go interstellar to save the day .

programme.desc: The Bigfoot legend is turned upside down when a bright young Yeti finds something he thought didnt exista human.

programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Vin Diagram - When Ben sees Vin Ethanol impressed with Kevin's automotive know-how, Ben's jealousy has him convinced that he has to out-do Kevin before the older boy influences Vin to embrace his bad-guy side at a charity race.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep47
programme.desc: A Sticky Situation - All Ben wants to do is stop Queen Bee from robbing a bank, but when Kevin shows up to try and be the hero and take all the glory himself, Ben will need to save the day twice or end up in hot honey.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep48
programme.desc: What Rhymes With Omnitrix? - At a poetry slam event, Charmcaster's reading of Kevin's poetry causes magical trouble for Ben and Gwen, causing mind swaps that have everyone confused as to who's fighting who.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep49
programme.desc: You Remind Me Of Someone - Ben and Gwen look for the infamous Bojamboo (the Bigfoot of the South) and discover that it's actually the FORGETI - at the same time as Kevin 11 - but when Ben and Kevin are blasted with the Forgeti's forgetfulness mist, they reverse roles and it's up to Gwen and Max to restore them back to normal.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep50
programme.desc: Adrenaland Jr. - Team Tennyson visits the safety-neutered version of Adrenaland known as 'Adrenaland Jr.', only to end up facing off against a bitter Kevin 11 - out to destroy everyone else's good (and safe!) time.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep2
programme.desc: "The Phantom, The Talking Dog And The Hot Hot Hot Sauce!" - Daphne gets a call from a friend that needs help. The gang heads to Nashville Tennessee to meet up with none other than country music legend Kacey Musgraves!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Hot Dog Dog! - Our mystery-solving gang is in Chicago investigating the haunting of a historic hot dog factory when they team up with famous competitive eater Joey Chestnut.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep4
programme.desc: A Moveable Mystery! - When Scooby Doo and the gang are on the trail of a monstrous gargoyle in the nighttime city of Paris they're stumped and need help solving the mystery.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Welcome To Oz Mitch - When Mitch, another resident of Kansas turns up, Dorothy can't wait to show him all the wonders of Oz! But Oz might not be the right place for this stick in the mud.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Wheeling Tin Man - When Tin Man falls in with the dangerous Wheelers, Dorothy and the guys have to save him before he attempts to jump across Emerald Gorge.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Home Away From Home - The Wizard creates a device so Dorothy will never be homesick. However, when it goes awry and starts replacing things from Oz with things from Kansas, Dorothy is told in order to separate the two worlds, she will have to leave Oz forever!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Vault Heist - When Ozma goes on a trip, she leaves Dorothy and her friends to look after the castle. The Wicked Witch sees an opportunity to get a hold of Ozma's most powerful magic and attempts to get the Wizard to help her break into the magical vault.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Witch One's The Boss - Now that the Wicked Witch has lost her witch powers, she must turn to Wilhelmina in hopes that her niece can help her get her evil magic groove back. Meanwhile, Dorothy and the gang help the Wizard get a handle on his magic powers.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Wingmen No More - After failing Wilhelmina for the last time, Frank and Lyman are stripped of their wings and replaced. Meanwhile, their wings attach themselves to Lion and Scarecrow. Dorothy has to make things right or Frank and Lyman are. Wingmen No More.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep9
programme.desc: I Wish I Could Get Back At Emma - When a wish seems to ask Ruby and the others to take revenge into their own hands, Mina stands her ground and refuses to take part. But will Ruby learn something from this friend fight that will help her stage a perfect resolution for the wisher? Meanwhile, a sweetheart offer for Daniels land hits a major bump in the road after he gets a wish of his own.

programme.desc: Ben 10 joins forces with his future self.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.desc: Scott's Story - A father confronts the limits of unconditional love when he discovers his own teenage son may be planning an unimaginable crime.

programme.desc: Ava's Story - After a married couple discovers their newborn is deaf, they elect to have cochlear implant surgery to correct the baby's handicap. When the surrogate who carried the child, who also happens to be deaf, learns the news, she kidnaps the baby for protection.

programme.title: Accused Ep3
programme.desc: Danny's Story - After the death of his ailing mother, a teenager suspects foul play when he discovers his mother's former hospice caretaker is now dating his father.

programme.title: Accused Ep4
programme.desc: Kendall's Story - After a man's daughter is molested in the park near their home, his friends encourage him to take justice into his own hands.

programme.title: Accused Ep6
programme.desc: Naataanii's Story - After a group of Navajo friends are arrested for protesting the local Uranium mine, they come up with a plan to try and shut it down for good.

programme.title: Accused Ep7
programme.desc: Brenda's Story - When an acerbic female stand-up comic reports she was sexually assaulted at her friend's party, the DA decides her highly questionable past, and reputation obfuscates a conviction and drops all charges against the suspect. Enraged, the comedian uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as a family man with an ideal life who finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss. Convinced of her innocence he decides to break her out of prison, but soon finds himself out of his depth.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Sorority Row
programme.desc: A group of sorority sisters find their lives in danger after a prank turns deadly.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Simon Reeve treks across the high mountains and treacherous ice fields of Patagonia, coming face to face with pumas and riding with gauchos.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Jordan - The Wadi Rum Desert - With its mountains rising up out of the sand, any journey through the Wadi Rum will leave you feeling you've traveled to another world. Join Ryan as he explores Amman and makes the arduous trek through the unforgiving Wadi Rum Desert.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep6
programme.desc: A tornado traps teachers in America, wildfires rip across England, a landslide hits hikers in Argentina, and a man descends into a deadly volcano.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Iceland - In this episode Robson heads to Iceland where he challenges a local fishing expert to a fishing contest.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Fall on the Tundra Ep4
programme.desc: Nunavik, meaning Great Land, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Girls of Oryx Plain Ep9
programme.desc: A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Critical Plains Ep10
programme.desc: While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Critical Plains Ep10
programme.desc: While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21

programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13

Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1012
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Foggy Skies - Mayor Humdinger tries pushing fog into Adventure Bay, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find animals missing in the clouds and save the day.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Hum-ata - Mayor Humdinger's birthday party goes horribly awry when Marshall Kitty gets trapped inside a life-sized piata.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Runaway Hamster Ball / The Perfectinator - Steel accidentally uses the growth ray on Stu and Safia's pet hamster, turning her into a giant stomping hamster! // Steel and Lady Fluffpot get involved in a tidying robot one-up-manship battle when Kai makes Botler the tidiest robot in the city.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save the Salmon - The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep124
programme.desc: The Clean Team / The Thinkybubble Boxen / Bubble Bubble Bossy and Trouble - Bossy and Turtle teach Honey Bear about teamwork. // Chipper is moving. // Bossy protects his bubble friend from popping.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-ms - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Toms who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Toms meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelles tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
