programme.desc: A Night At The Circuits - Messy is exploring science questions. He joins his friends in OKIDO on an adventure. They explore the electrical world of circuits to fix Zoe's communicator.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Wish List - Monty talks about his friend Barnaby who seems to have every toy imaginable. This leads to him and Jimmy Jones to wonder what it would be like to have whatever you want.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Andy and the Flamingos - Andy heads to the Andes in South America to paint some flamingos in a mountain lake.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Pedal Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that are pedal powered! Grace drives a pedal car, shows off a pedal glider and then has a race with Speedy on a water bike!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Sleepy Shipmates - Cook and Line are being kept awake at night by a noisy snorer. Captain HeyHo insists it isn't her, but later on in the cove the mystery snorer is revealed.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep14
programme.desc: Emily's Winter Party Special - It is wintertime on Sodor and there is going to be a Winter Festival at the Town Square. The Fat Controller tells the engines that he will choose the most helpful engine to be the party engine.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Stormy Seagulls - The seals are sheltering from the storm, but the seagulls are being a bit rude.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dog Loves Monsters - Dog and Pug visit a spooky castle, where they meet a princess who has no friends. Fortunately, they find a baby dragon who becomes best of friends with the princess.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Dr. Funny Bones - Following advice from Gran, Monty tells Stan a joke to keep his mind preoccupied from a splinter in his finger. This leads him to wonder if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep10
programme.desc: It's Time to Run a Marathon - JoJo's worried she will be joining Jared on his marathon until she realises she's just going to support him! JoJo learns that being a supporter is almost as important as being a runner.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Puzzlin' Tool Wall - Logi-Po's tools fit neatly on the wall - so, when Doug-Po knocks them down, can the rest of the team put everything back together?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Piled-Up Play - When Jo's game of Target Ball overruns and the Blockers shut down the playing field, Team Tinpo come up with a sweet solution so three games can be played at the same time.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Climate Change, The Arctic Ocean - The Go Jetters are watching for polar bears, but an iceberg is heading for their ship!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Operation Jewel - Evil Pea steals Tomato's precious jewel. Supertato ventures to get it back by secretly lifting the jewel from Evil Pea's crown and defeating a crowd of rampaging Mini Peas.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Baddie Belt - Evil Pea swaps Supertato's Tato-Belt with her evil Baddie-Belt which has absurd and baffling functions. Supertato has to work out how to rescue Carrot and Pea with the Baddie Belt.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Up Down, Down Up - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Uppy Downy. They have fun going up down, down up!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Whale - Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.desc: Krusty Kleaners - After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette - Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her, or her new glasses?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Taken / The Flying Beast - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie. // Alvin tries to convince Dave that he's being hunted by a flying beast.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth / Zeela The Great - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse. // Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!'/ Patrick the Mailman - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep277
programme.desc: Captain Pipsqueak/Plane to Sea - Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L. // SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep264
programme.desc: Plankton's Intern - Plankton needs help stealing the formula, so he hires an intern who knows more about Mr. Krabs than anyone.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Midnight Snack Attack / Hot Pearl-tato - After SpongeBob and Patrick eat a secret snack experiment, Plankton must reverse the monstrous side effects. // Mr. Krabs needs to find a babysitter for little Pearl, but she proves too much for the campers to handle.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Flip This Flip / Haunted House Call - The Loud kids help Flip clean up his image to impress his middle school crush. // When the Mortician's Club can't afford tickets to Casket Con, they decide to start a business to raise money.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Taunting Hour / Musical Chairs - After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics. // Lincoln convinces his teacher, Mr. Bolhofner, to join the Doo-Dads in order to get a better seat in class.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Absent Minded / Be Stella My Heart - Clyde discovers he didn't earn junior administrator job. But can he give up the perks that come along with it? // When the new girl starts hanging around Lincoln and his friends, they begin to suspect she likes one of them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep287
programme.desc: Friendiversary / Mandatory Music - SpongeBob celebrates the anniversary of his friendship with Squidward. Squidward does not. // Squidward's lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Upturn Girls - Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Little Patscals / The Pre-Historic Patrick Star Show - Patrick learns what GrandPat's childhood was like. // Cave Pat hosts a show with his cave family.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bend It Like Abuelo - Hector finally joins his dream soccer team as their good luck charm, but what happens when his luck runs out?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep277
programme.desc: Captain Pipsqueak/Plane to Sea - Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L. // SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep167
programme.desc: The Krabby Patty That Ate Bikini Bottom - Mr. Krabs uses Sandy's experimental growth formula on a Krabby Patty and the results are disastrous!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Nightmares and Daydreams - On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains - It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep307
programme.desc: King Me / Private and the Winky Factory - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. // Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies. // The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Mayor Ariel - As Mayor Peeve announces his re-election campaign, Ariel returns to the mountain and runs against him for mayor.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 3: Into the Inferno - Sokka, Toph and Suki begin destroying the airship fleet. Aang duels Ozai, but is soon overwhelmed because of his reluctance to kill him.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 4: Avatar Aang - Katara eventually defeats Azula by trapping her in ice, and heals Zuko. Sokka, Toph and Suki destroy the airship fleet.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Taken to the Cleaners / Mugshot - Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep116
programme.desc: In the Sky / Best Buddies - When Diamondo refuses to give the twins a ride in his spaceship they embark on some space exploration of their own. // Best becomes entangled in a series of awkward situations when he pretends to know someone he's never met before.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chimp Chomp Chumps / Precious Pig - Fanboy and Chum Chum are happily waiting in line for movie tickets when Boog arrives and ruins everything. // Fanboy is devastated when he is stripped of his class pet privileges.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Rusty Marks The Spot / Rusty's Bits On The Fritz - When Rusty finds an old pirate's map, he and the gang dig up a lot more than treasure. // When the Bits wander into Rusty's parts replicator, the gang winds up with more bits than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Fairy Tale Fuzzly / Super Secret Passageway - Harriet Bouffant is stuck in the tower, and Abby and Bozzly must save her! // Abby and Bozzly help Otis improve his Hide and Seek skills, and they all wind up stuck in an undiscovered secret passage!

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Fuzzly Camping Trip - While on a camping trip, Abby and the Fuzzlies meet a brand new Fuzzly: Grumbles!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep88
programme.desc: Money Talks / Spongebob Vs The Patty Gadget / Slimy Dancing - Mr. Krabs makes a wish that he could talk to money. // SpongeBob competes against a patty-making machine. // Squidward trains SpongeBob for the Bikini Bottom dance contest.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep89
programme.desc: The Krusty Sponge / Sing a Song of Patrick - SpongeBob becomes the latest local obsession after a notable food critic gives him high ratings. // SpongeBob helps Patrick get his song some air time at the local radio station.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep90
programme.desc: A Flea In Her Dome / Donut Of Shame / The Krusty Plate - SpongeBob and Patrick try to help Sandy rid her Tree Dome of fleas. // When Patrick accidentally takes SpongeBobs donut he is wracked with guilt over his crime. // SpongeBob battles a persistent speck of food that is on a plate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep91
programme.desc: Goo Goo Gas / Le Big Switch - Plankton creates a gas that turns everyone at the Krusty Krab into babies. // After being enrolled in a chef exchange program, SpongeBob switches places with a snooty French chef from a high-end restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep93
programme.desc: Picture Day / Pat No Pay / Blackjack - It's Picture Day for the Boating School Year Book. // When Patrick eats his weight in Krabby Patties without paying, Mr. Krabs puts him to work in the restaurant. // SpongeBob's parents are missing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep94
programme.desc: Blackened Sponge / Mermaid Man vs. Sponge - SpongeBob accidentally punches himself in the face leaving behind a hideous black eye, but is too embarrassed to tell anyone the truth. // Plankton has brainwashed Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Zeela The Great - Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Davey Boy - Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Dr. Sleep - In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep. But does it work?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep707
programme.desc: Road Trip: From Brad to Worse / Road Trip: Doll Day Afternoon - When the Louds run into Mom's old camp crush turned celebrity at a State Fair, Dad tries to one-up him to impress Rita. // Realizing Mr. Coconuts is missing, Luan rallies the Louds to track him down along Route 66.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Road Trip: Screen Queen / Road Trip: Hide and Sneak - When the Louds' road trip takes them to Hollywood, Lola is determined to become a star and land a leading role. // To help Mom make the deadline for her column, the Louds have to avoid the Casagrandes when they visit Great Lakes City.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep104

programme.title: Media Watch Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: Four Corners - Super Power Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The cost of living with Coles and Woolworths. We uncover the tactics used by supermarkets to keep prices high - and competition out. Both deny price gouging but there are now six inquiries and reviews targeting the duopoly.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso travels to Thursday Island, home of the Kaurareg people and the administrative hub of the Torres Straits to cook contemporary, multicultural dishes.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso travels to Thursday Island, home of the Kaurareg people and the administrative hub of the Torres Straits to cook contemporary, multicultural dishes.

programme.title: India Now: Summer Special Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Avani Dias looks at some of the issues in Indian society including why textbooks are rewriting history, the long shadow of British colonialism, how each sari tells a story, India's love of whiskey plus the secret of a spice.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Matthew Doran brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep55
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Elsternwick, VIC Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Interior designer Lori Bastone and town planner Maugan Bastone want to create a quirky, one-of-a kind contemporary home with an off-street car stacker and a trapeze net over the dining table.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Riverkeeper Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Andrew Kelly works as a Riverkeeper on Melbourne's iconic Yarra River, and he sees the river, it's banks and surrounding flora as one living entity, a river of green.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep75
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 1 - Collingwood v Sydney Swans Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Friday Night Football in Round 1 sees the Collingwood Magpies host the Sydney Swans at the MCG.

programme.title: The World Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep55
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The land of the free and home of the brave or is Washington broken and America's democracy a farce? Chas and John look at gridlock in Congress, chaos on the border, plus questions over age, eligibility and legitimacy.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep55
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep55
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Khanh Ong journeys to the coastal town of Port Lincoln in South Australia to unlock the secrets of the local seafood. Khanh learns how to trawl for wild prawns, harvest oysters and forages for unique coastal ingredients.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Submission Specialists - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep505JoseAldoKingsMMAAndersonSilva
programme.desc: Jose Aldo gives us insight into his unique relationship with coach and lifelong friend Dede Pederneiras. Master Rafael Cordeiro gives a detailed history of world-renowned gym Kings MMA. UFC fighters explain why ten-time middleweight title defender Anderson Silva, was so iconic to the world of MMA.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC285JonesvsGane
programme.desc: At UFC 285, former 205-pound champ Jon Jones moves up to face Ciryl Gane for the heavyweight belt in the main event. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will face Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Episode 903 Hispanice Heritage Month Pt 1 - UFC Ultimate Knockouts returns with part one of our Hispanic Heritage Month celebration. See incredible KOs from Yair Rodriguez, Cub Swanson, Marlon Chito Vera, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Submission Specialists - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women
programme.desc: AI PEPPERS vs RED SPARKS - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: BUNDESLIGA: 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION
programme.desc: BUNDESLIGA 60 YEARS RECORDS COMPILATION - Goals, saves and other superhuman feats that have graced the Bundesliga. Since inception in 1963, who stands atop the Bundesliga charts?

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: Episode 901: UFC 256 Figueiredo vs Moreno 1 - An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
